message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Looking at the income statement, I can see all the expense line items:
- Administrative Expenses: 286483.51
- Selling Expenses: 793728.19
- Depreciation: 45760.13
- Financial Expenses: 112130.48

Among these, "Administrative Expenses" generally refers to the costs of general management and administration of the entity. This includes expenses like office costs, management salaries, legal fees, and other costs related to running the business as a whole.

Therefore, the value of costs of general management and administration is 286483.51.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '286483.51'}}
```
